name: SANRI Demo
description:
Demo is now available for download!

WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM! 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2137660/SANRI/

SANRI is a first-person psychological horror game where you play a schizophrenic character whose wife disappeared during camp. Face the delusions, solve the mystery and try to find her despite your constantly distorted perception of time-space. 

What would you do if you woke up after a nice night camping with your partner and couldn't see her next to you? Grab your flashlight and dive deep into the forest to find it. Your schizophrenic delusions will never leave you. Despite all this, will you be able to find him?
